title: Diamond-Studded Gold Kada - Dazzling Vanki Bangaru Kadiyam
materials: G Color). Expertly crafted with a smooth finish and durable construction.
features: Modern Kada design with geometric gold accents. Studded with brilliant-cut diamonds in a prong setting, creating a sparkling visual. Features clean lines and a contemporary silhouette for everyday elegance. The simple clasp allows for easy wearing.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for anniversaries and birthdays. Adds a touch of sparkle to any outfit
description: Crafted with the finest 22K gold and ethically sourced diamonds. Combines the timeless appeal of gold jewelry with modern design sensibilities. Comfortable for all-day wear and durable enough to be cherished for generations. The diamonds bring sparkle and enhance the look.
